org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmaster

类 JobManagerRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmaster.JobManagerRunner
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    OnCompletionActions, LeaderContender, FatalErrorHandler

    public class JobManagerRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements LeaderContender, OnCompletionActions, FatalErrorHandler
    The runner for the job manager. It deals with job level leader election and make underlying job manager properly reacted.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private FatalErrorHandler errorHandler
      The handler to call in case of fatal (unrecoverable) errors.
      private JobGraph jobGraph
      The job graph needs to run.
      private JobMaster jobManager 
      private JobManagerMetricGroup jobManagerMetricGroup 
      private JobManagerServices jobManagerServices 
      private LeaderElectionService leaderElectionService
      Leader election for this job.
      private java.lang.Object lock
      Lock to ensure that this runner can deal with leader election event and job completion notifies simultaneously.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger log 
      private RunningJobsRegistry runningJobsRegistry
      Used to check whether a job needs to be run.
      private boolean shutdown
      flag marking the runner as shut down.
      private Time timeout 
      private OnCompletionActions toNotifyOnComplete
      The listener to notify once the job completes - either successfully or unsuccessfully.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • JobManagerRunner

        public JobManagerRunner(ResourceID resourceId,
                        JobGraph jobGraph,
                        Configuration configuration,
                        RpcService rpcService,
                        HighAvailabilityServices haServices,
                        HeartbeatServices heartbeatServices,
                        JobManagerServices jobManagerServices,
                        MetricRegistry metricRegistry,
                        OnCompletionActions toNotifyOnComplete,
                        FatalErrorHandler errorHandler)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Exceptions that occur while creating the JobManager or JobManagerRunner are directly thrown and not reported to the given FatalErrorHandler.

        This JobManagerRunner assumes that it owns the given JobManagerServices. It will shut them down on error and on calls to shutdown().

        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the runner cannot be set up, because either one of the required services could not be started, ot the Job could not be initialized.

      • unregisterJobFromHighAvailability

        private void unregisterJobFromHighAvailability()
        Marks this runner's job as not running. Other JobManager will not recover the job after this call.

        This method never throws an exception.

      • grantLeadership

        public void grantLeadership(java.util.UUID leaderSessionID)
        从接口复制的说明: LeaderContender
        Callback method which is called by the LeaderElectionService upon selecting this instance as the new leader. The method is called with the new leader session ID.
        指定者:
        grantLeadership 在接口中 LeaderContender
        参数:
        leaderSessionID - New leader session ID

      • revokeLeadership

        public void revokeLeadership()
        从接口复制的说明: LeaderContender
        Callback method which is called by the LeaderElectionService upon revoking the leadership of a former leader. This might happen in case that multiple contenders have been granted leadership.
        指定者:
        revokeLeadership 在接口中 LeaderContender

      • getAddress

        public java.lang.String getAddress()
        从接口复制的说明: LeaderContender
        Returns the address of the LeaderContender under which other instances can connect to it.
        指定者:
        getAddress 在接口中 LeaderContender
        返回:
        Address of this contender.

      • handleError

        指定者:
